data.name: ForgotPassword
data.value: Password e e lebetsweng

data.name: Success.Account.Verified
data.value: User Account Email Address Verified Successfully. Jaanong o ka dirisa leina la gago la modirisi le phasewete.

data.name: Message.Account.NotVerified
data.value: Aterese ya imeile ya akhaonto ya modirisi ga e kgone go netefadiwa. Tsweetswee ikgolaganye le motsamaisi wa gago go bona ditaelo tse dingwe.

data.name: Success.Account.Linked
data.value: User Account Linked Successfully. You Can Now Login With Your External Login Below.

data.name: Message.Account.NotLinked
data.value: External login can't be link. Tsweetswee ikgolaganye le motsamaisi wa gago go bona ditaelo tse dingwe.

data.name: Error.Login.Fail
data.value: Login Failed. Tsweetswee gakologelwa gore ditshwantsho tse di dirisiwang ke Setswana. Fa o lekile go ikwadisa makgetlho a le mantsi mme o sa atlega, akhaonto ya gago e tla tswalelwa ka lobaka lo lo rileng. Ela tlhoko gore diakhaonto tsa badirisi gantsi di tlhoka netefatso ya aterese ya imeile, ka jalo o ka batla go lekola imeile ya gago go bona kitsiso.

data.name: Message.Required.UserInfo
data.value: Tsweetswee tlamela ka dikarolo tsotlhe tse di tlhokegang

data.name: Info.SignedIn
data.value: O setse o saenne

data.name: Message.ForgotPassword
data.value: Tsweetswee tsenya leina la modirisi le le amanang le akhaonto ya gago mme o tlhophe tlhopho ya phasewete e e lebetsweng gape

data.name: Message.ForgotUser
data.value: Tsweetswee leba aterese ya imeile e e amanang le akhaonto ya gago ya modirisi go bona kitsiso ya go seta phasewete

data.name: Message.UserDoesNotExist
data.value: Modirisi ga a yo

data.name: Code.HelpText
data.value: Tsweetswee tsenya khoutu ya netefatso e e sireletsegileng e o e rometsweng ka imeili.

data.name: Code.Placeholder
data.value: Khoutu ya Netefatso

data.name: Code.Text
data.value: Khoutu ya Netefatso:

data.name: Error.TwoFactor.Fail
data.value: Verification Failed. Tsweetswee netefatsa gore o kwadile khoutu e e kwadilweng mo foromong e e kwadilweng mo poelong ya gago. Fa o batla go kopa khoutu e ntšhwa ya netefatso, tsweetswee tlhopha tlhopho ya go phimola mme o saenele gape.

data.name: Message.TwoFactor
data.value: Khoutu ya netefatso e e sireletsegileng e rometswe mo atereseng ya gago ya imeili. Tsweetswee tsenya khoutu e o e amogetseng. Fa o sa amogele khoutu kgotsa o latlhegetswe ke phitlhelelo ya imeile ya gago, tsweetswee ikgolaganye le motsamaisi wa gago.

data.name: Password.HelpText
data.value: Tsweetswee tsenya phasewete e e amanang le akhaonto ya gago. Gakologelwa gore ditshwantsho tse di dirisiwang ke Setswana. Fa o sa atlege go tsena mo akhaontong ya gago makgetlho a le mantsi, o tla tswalelwa kwa ntle ka lobaka lo lo rileng.

data.name: Password.Placeholder
data.value: Password

data.name: Password.Text
data.value: Password:

data.name: Remember.HelpText
data.value: Tlhalosa gore a o ka rata go ikwadisa gape mo nakong e e tlang fa o etela website eno

data.name: Remember.Text
data.value: Onkgopotse

data.name: Username.HelpText
data.value: Tsweetswee tsenya leina la modirisi le le amanang le akhaonto ya gago.

data.name: Username.Placeholder
data.value: Leina la modirisi

data.name: Username.Text
data.value: Username:

data.name: Use
data.value: Tiriso

data.name: Error.LoadLogin
data.value: Error Loading Login

data.name: Error.Login
data.value: Error Performing Login

data.name: Error.ResetPassword
data.value: Error Resetting Password

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.DuplicateEmail
data.value: Multiple User Accounts Already Exist With The Email Address Of Your External Login. Tsweetswee ikgolaganye le motsamaisi wa gago go bona ditaelo tse dingwe.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.MissingClaims
data.value: Motlamedi wa Lefapha la Merero ya Selegae o ne a sa tlamele ka tshedimosetso yotlhe e e tlhokegang. Tsweetswee ikgolaganye le motsamaisi wa gago go bona ditaelo tse dingwe.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.ProviderKeyMismatch
data.value: An error happened verifying your external login. Tsweetswee ikgolaganye le motsamaisi wa gago go bona ditaelo tse dingwe.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.UserDoesNotExist
data.value: Aterese ya gago ya imeile e e tsamaisanang le aterese ya gago ya imeile ga e yone. Tsweetswee ikgolaganye le motsamaisi wa gago go bona ditaelo tse dingwe.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.UserNotCreated
data.value: Akhaonto ya modirisi ga e ka ke ya tlhomiwa go tsena mo sedirisiweng sa gago sa kwa ntle. Tsweetswee ikgolaganye le motsamaisi wa gago go bona ditaelo tse dingwe.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.VerificationRequired
data.value: Gore o kgone go golaganya akhaonto ya gago ya modirisi le akhaonto ya gago ya modirisi, o tshwanetse go netefatsa gore o na le boitshupo jo bo siameng. Tsweetswee leba imeile ya gago go bona ditaelo tse dingwe.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.AccessDenied
data.value: Your External Login Was Denied Access. Tsweetswee ikgolaganye le motsamaisi wa gago go bona ditaelo tse dingwe.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.RemoteFailure
data.value: Your External Login Failed. Tsweetswee ikgolaganye le motsamaisi wa gago go bona ditaelo tse dingwe.

data.name: ExternalLoginStatus.ReviewClaims
data.value: The Review Claims Option Was Enabled In External Login Settings. Tsweetswee leba lekwaloitshupo la Motlhankedi wa Tshedimosetso go bona dingongorego tse di buseditsweng ke motlamedi.

data.name: Register
data.value: Register as new user?
